property.name: Battery Operation
property.description: Enable support for Battery operation

property.name: Device ID PS Key
property.description: Enable Device ID Profile (DIP). Allows for PS configurable Device Id information, from PSKEY_DEVICE_ID, but requires permanent use of a memory pool to hold the SDP record

property.name: Enable BLE/GATT
property.description: Enable BLE/GATT support in the application. GATT will only be used with a Bluetooth Low Energy link.

property.name: BLE when Powered Off
property.description: Specifies the BLE behaviour when the application is powered off.

property.name: Enable GATT ANCS Client
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT ANCS Client functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Heart Rate Client
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Heart Rate Client (Collector) functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Find Me Client
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Find Me Client functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT HID Client
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT HID Client functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Battery Server
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Battery Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Remote Battery Server
property.description: If GATT Battery Server is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Remote Battery Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Peer Battery Server
property.description: If GATT Battery Server is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Peer Battery Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Find Me Server
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Find Me Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT GAIA Server
property.description: If GATT support and GAIA features are enabled, this option will also enable the GATT GAIA Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Proximity Server
property.description: If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Find Me Server functionality.

property.name: Enable GATT Heart Rate Server
property.description:
If GATT support is enabled, this option will also enable the GATT Heart Rate Server functionality.
Note The application support for using actual sensor needs to be added based on host requirement without which the measurements cannot be sent to remote device.

property.name: Infrared Remote support
property.description: Enable support for Infrared remote controllers. CSR8670 only.

property.name: Capsense
property.description: Enable Capacitive touch sensors. CSR8670 only.

property.name: AVRCP
property.description: Enable Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP).

property.name: AVRCP Now Playing
property.description: Enable Now Playing functionality of AVRCP 1.5.

property.name: AVRCP Player App
property.description: Enable Player Application Settings functionality of AVRCP 1.5.

property.name: AVRCP Browsing
property.description: Enable Browsing functionality of AVRCP 1.5.

property.name: cVc
property.description:
Configures sink.mak to copy cVc applications into the image directory. Further cVc configuration can be done in the Sink Confiuguration Tool and the Universal Front End.
Note if using cVc a license key must be used before SCO audio will be heard.

property.name: Three Way Calling
property.description: Enable Three Way Calling.

property.name: Subwoofer Link
property.description: Enable support for connections to a subwoofer device

property.name: Party Mode
property.description: Enable support for party mode

property.name: USB
property.description: Enable USB functionality.

property.name: USB Audio
property.description: Enable USB Audio functionality.

property.name: USB MS Readme
property.description: Headet.mak directive that copies the example USB mass storage files into the filesystem

property.name: Speech Recognition
property.description: Enable Speech recognition.

property.name: Wired Audio
property.description: Enable Wired Audio support.

property.name: Hi Res Audio
property.description:
Enable Hi Resolution (88.2 and 96 KHz) Audio support.
Note: Hi Res audio is only supported on CSR8675 and CSR8676. If Hi-Res audio enabled then TWS, SareMe and SWAT MUST NOT be enabled. These features WILL NOT function properly if enabled.

property.name: FM Audio
property.description: Enable FM Audio support.

property.name: FM Audio RDS
property.description: Enable FM Audio RDS support.

property.name: PBAP
property.description: Enable Phone Book Access Profile (PBAP) features.

property.name: GAIA
property.description: Enable Generic Application Interface Architecture (GAIA).

property.name: GAIA RFCOMM
property.description: Use RFCOMM instead of SPP for the GAIA service.

property.name: GAIA_PERSISTENT_EQ
property.description: Store User Defined EQ Bank 1 Settings in Persistent Storage for the GAIA service. Compiler flags for GAIA service must be enabled alongside this flag for this feature to be enabled.

property.name: MAP
property.description: Enable Message Access Profile (MAP) features.

property.name: Display
property.description: Enable Display (e.g. CNS10010v1 add on board).

property.name: Extra Codec
property.description: Enable support for the A2DP codecs MP3, AAC and aptX.

property.name: aptX Sprint
property.description: Enable support for the A2DP codec aptX Low Latency variant.

property.name: Faststream
property.description: Enable support for the A2DP Faststream variant.

property.name: Peer Device Support
property.description: Enable support for connections to peer devices.

property.name: Peer Device Battery Level
property.description: Enable support for Peer Battery level, Peer device support must be enabled as well.

property.name: Device Upgrade
property.description: Enable support for device upgrade.

property.name: Ambient Noise Cancellation
property.description: Enable support for Ambient Noise Cancellation (ANC). The ANC feature requires an additional add-on installer and this must be applied before this property can be enabled. ANC is a CSR8675 feature only and not to be used when 24 Bit audio is enabled.

property.name: BR/EDR Secure Connection
property.description: Enable support for BR/EDR Secure Connection (SC). BR/EDR SC is a CSR8675 feature only.

property.name: Buffer defence protection mechanism
property.description: Enable protection againt buffer defences

property.name: AHI Transport
property.description: Transport used by Config Tool.

property.name: Software Variant
property.description: Software Variant for this build.

property.name: Hardware Variant
property.description: Hardware Variant for this build.

property.name: Enable HID Selfie mode
property.description: Enable selfie mode.
